It'd be nice to update the [`doc/files.md`](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/doc/files.md) as well:

https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/2b45cf0bcdb3d2c1de46899e30885c953b57b475/src/index/coinstatsindex.cpp#L100

comments.body: test/functional/rpc_blockchain.py:        # muhash should not be included in gettxoutset unless requested.

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -142,8 +142,11 @@
 # both prior transactions and several dozen future transactions.
 #keypool=100
 
+# Maintain coinstats index used by the gettxoutsetinfo RPC (default: 0).
+#coinstatsindex=1
+
 # Enable pruning to reduce storage requirements by deleting old blocks.
-# This mode is incompatible with -txindex and -rescan.
+# This mode is incompatible with -txindex, -coinstatsindex and -rescan.
comments.body: This is wrong. Indexes are compatible with pruning, if done right.
(same mistake in the test, that can be fixed as well)

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -142,8 +142,11 @@
 # both prior transactions and several dozen future transactions.
 #keypool=100
 
+# Maintain coinstats index used by the gettxoutsetinfo RPC (default: 0).
+#coinstatsindex=1
+
 # Enable pruning to reduce storage requirements by deleting old blocks.
-# This mode is incompatible with -txindex and -rescan.
+# This mode is incompatible with -txindex, -coinstatsindex and -rescan.

@@ -142,8 +142,11 @@
 # both prior transactions and several dozen future transactions.
 #keypool=100
 
+# Maintain coinstats index used by the gettxoutsetinfo RPC (default: 0).
+#coinstatsindex=1
+
 # Enable pruning to reduce storage requirements by deleting old blocks.
-# This mode is incompatible with -txindex and -rescan.
+# This mode is incompatible with -txindex, -coinstatsindex and -rescan.
comments.body: I presumed that #15946 changed this for all index types, but maybe I am mistaken.

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -142,8 +142,11 @@
 # both prior transactions and several dozen future transactions.
 #keypool=100
 
+# Maintain coinstats index used by the gettxoutsetinfo RPC (default: 0).
+#coinstatsindex=1
+
 # Enable pruning to reduce storage requirements by deleting old blocks.
-# This mode is incompatible with -txindex and -rescan.
+# This mode is incompatible with -txindex, -coinstatsindex and -rescan.
comments.body:
In principle it seems it should be doable: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19521/#discussion_r603607663 (not sure this GitHub link is working so provided in code markdown too)

`https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19521/#discussion_r603607663`
